channel.title: [614] Spawning NPCs?
channel.description: I was wondering how to spawn npcs on RevengeScape 614 source, anyone know how? :confused:

item.title: [614] Spawning NPCs?
item.dc:creator: @New_Legacy New Legacy
item.description:
@New_Legacy wrote:

what file are they in?

soz for Grave digging

Read full topic

item.title: [614] Spawning NPCs?
item.dc:creator: @Alec_XI Alec XI
item.description:
@Alec_XI wrote:

[quote=“jmood128, post:4, topic:368597”][quote author=Alec XI link=topic=464745.msg3398398#msg3398398 date=1289685571]

Use the command, I am not sure if it has it thought since I don’t use anything above 317.

Also you can use the .cfg file with all the spawns in it to spawn new npc’s.

There isn’t any .cfg file like 317, its completely different from 317.
[/quote]

Then go into the file that holds all npc spawns. If their is no file then it is most likely in the source files… Or it might be loaded through a database.[/quote]
I know the file that holds all NPC spawns, cause I went onto another tutorial and it told me where to go and what to do, but the files for adding/spawning NPCs weren’t there so I posted this to make sure that the tutorial was messed up, not my source…

Read full topic

item.title: [614] Spawning NPCs?
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“Alec XI, post:3, topic:368597”][quote author=jmood128 link=topic=464745.msg3398396#msg3398396 date=1289685426]
Use the command, I am not sure if it has it thought since I don’t use anything above 317.

Also you can use the .cfg file with all the spawns in it to spawn new npc’s.
[/quote]
There isn’t any .cfg file like 317, its completely different from 317.[/quote]

Then go into the file that holds all npc spawns. If their is no file then it is most likely in the source files… Or it might be loaded through a database.

Read full topic
